topic.title: CR001a: Replace Odyssey Branding with Temenos Branding

section.title: Description
section.p: Replace or update existing images, texts, user interfaces, documentation that contains references to Odyssey with Temenos branding

li.p: Update manually all file (*.dita, *.ditamap,...) that contains a reference to Odyssey (plain word, acronym, etc.) by a Temenos equivalent terminology.
A tool similar tool to grepwill be your best friend

Update manually all messages produced by Design Studio and Tests. This concerns all messages displayed in dialogs, console, views, etc.) As DITA Documentation, all source files (*.java *.properties, *.xml, etc.) that contains a reference to Odyssey (plain word, acronym, etc.) by a Temenos equivalent terminology.
A tool similar to grepwill also be your best friend
Replace all Odyssey images by a Temenosequivalent images. according to the FDS.

Eventually adapt all the container that displayed these new images. For instance the splash screen the About Box, dialogs...). Note that the images Odyssey Rings that overlap some images (Navigator for ex), are kept and not replaced/removed.
Here also a tool similarFile search and any Image Editor will your best friends
The files MANIFEST.MF will not be updated. We keep the reference to Odyssey Financial Technologies
Do not update CheckStyle configuration files because there exist other products that use these files
The tool SnagIt can also be used to convert images to other format if necessary. SnagIt offer also a small image editor

The excellent free tool IcoFX (http://icofx.ro/index.html) can be used to build the special file ofs.ico that is composed of several icons. This file is used by windows to display the correct icon, for instance in the task bar, the windows application selector, or in the file explorer.
